Name: Jungle-Tag
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Treecko, Grovyle, and Sceptile.  Swap a Grovy-Shoot and a Grovy-Card for a Jungle-Tag at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
